answers.answer: I'm exactly 2 weeks behind u just turned 24 weeks today!!:) I also felt real huge today and baby girl was sticking her head up in my ribs so I was in pain all day lol. I have my glucose test tmrw and an ultrasound next Friday;) I didn't get to see her face at the last ultrasound that's why I have another one next week:)

question: So I just turned 26 weeks today. I felt so.fat this morning.. but I bought two belly bands and I felt a million times better. They smoothed out everything and really defined my.belly, I really recommend them.Also, my mom bought my baby boy his 4 in 1, so he has somewhere to sleep! (Other than my arms)Tomorrow is my diabetes test and an ultrasound. I hope all goes well, and my boyfriend is finally in town. It'll be his first time going :)Hope you all are doing great too!
title: Having a good day!! 26 weeks
